messages.content:
Use the updated S3 Terraform (AWS provider v5) I just provided. Then:
1) terraform init → validate → plan (no apply)
2) Run security scan (Checkov/policy_engine) and summarize findings
3) Show a brief diff versus my previous snippet (highlight lifecycle, ownership controls, bucket policy)
4) If any checks fail, auto-fix and re-run validate/plan/scan, then summarize in ≤5 bullets

I need more information: Which AWS region would you like to use?
Is this for development, staging, or production?
